title: How to write great content without references from other sites - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re not keen to reference other sites, then you need to write about topics that you know a lot about. However, you might still need to reference stats and other info, so you should consider referencing other quality resources. I’m not sure why you don’t want to reference other sites; if you’re worried about competing with them for keyword rankings, then make the links no-follow. Google doesn’t crawl for no-follow links, so they won’t benefit the other site as much, but you’ll still appear informed and add gravitas to your content.

Write about something your knowledgeable in or at least have interest in. Of course, you should still include references to make to your article or blog post more authoritive but having personal experience in a topic is still a good way to write about something without having to do research.
